Event.Name: AmritaSiddhaYoga
Event.Description: Sunday to Saturday respectively coinciding with the constellations Hasta, Sravana, Aswini, Anuradha, Pushya, Revati and Rohini will give rise to Amita Siddha Yoga.

Event.Name: PanchangaSuddhi
Event.Description: Panchanga Suddhi. - We have already said that a Panchanga consists of tithi, vara, nakshatra. yoga and karana. All these must be auspicious. In regard to lunar days, the 4th, 6th, 8th, 12th and 14th, full and new moon days should be avoided. In regard to vara, Thursday and Friday are held to be suitable for all works. Tuesday, is to be generally avoided except when it happens to be the 10th, 12th or 16th day of the child's birth when the child's Namakarana (baptising or giving name) may be performed. Of the several Nakshatras, Bharani and Krittika should be avoided for all auspicious works as these two are said to be presided o ver by the god of death (Yama) and the god of fire (Agni) respectively. In urgent cases if the Lagna could be fortified, the dosha due to nakshatra may get neutralised. The last parts of Aslesha, Jyeshta and Revati should also be avoided. Coming to the Yoga (vide page 12) the 6th (Atiganda). 9th (Soola). 10th (Ganda), 17th (Vyatipata) and 27th (Vydhruti) have deleterious effects upon events which are started or commenced under them. - The Karana chosen must be appropriate to the election in view. Thus Bava is auspicious for starting works of permanent importance while Thaithula is propitious for marriage. Bhadra is unfit for any good work but is eminently suitable for violent and cruel deeds. For getting initiation into kshudra mantras Sakuni Havana is propitious. Therefore, Panchanga Suddhi means a good lunar day, a beneficial weekday, an auspicious constellation, a good yoga and a fertilising Karana.

Event.Name: UgraYoga
Event.Description: Any treatment commenced under Ugra yogas are supposed to prove successful. Ugra yogas arise when the 3rd (or 9th), 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, 9th, 10th, 12th (or 3rd) and 13th lunar days coincide respectively with Rohini, Uttara, Sravana, Mrigasira. Revats, Krittika, Pushva, Anuradha. Krittika (or Makha).

Event.Name: SuryaSankramana
Event.Description: The 2nd great evil is Surya Sankramana or the solar ingress into different zodiacal signs. When the Sun is about to leave one sign and enter another there seem to occur certain disturbances in the organisation of the solar forces and such times are not recommended for any good work. On the contrary, they are held to be propitious for meditation, initiation into secret mantras and performance of certain religious rites which are held to purify not only the bodily electrical discharges but also the mental currents. Sixteen ghatis (6 hours 24 minutes) both before and after the entry of the Sun into a new sign should be rejected for all new works.

Event.Name: KarthariDosha
Event.Description: Karthari means scissors. In an election, when two evil planets are placed on either side of the Lagna, the combination goes under the special name of Karthari Dosha and it should be rejected for good work particularly in regard to marriage.

Event.Name: ShashtashtaRiphagathaChandraDosha
Event.Description: Shashtashta Riphagatha Chandra Dosha. - The Moon should invariably be avoided in the 6th, 8th and 12th houses from the Lagna rising in an election chart.

Event.Name: SagrahaChandraDosha
Event.Description: Sagraha Chandra Dosha. - The Moon's association (conjunction) with any other planet, benefic or malefic, should be avoided. This injunction is specially applicable in case of marriage.

Event.Name: UdayasthaSuddhi
Event.Description: Udayasta Suddhi. - The Lagna and the seventh should be strong. The Lagna should be occupied by its own lord and the Navamsa Lagna by its own lord or vice versa or lord of Lagna should aspect Navamsa Lagna and vice versa. Similarly the seventh and the lord of the seventh Bhava should be favourably disposed. The strength of Lagna and the seventh is necessary in all elections but especially so in regard to marriage.

Event.Name: SiddhaYoga
Event.Description: When a certain weekday coincides with a certain asterism and a certain lunar day, it becomes specialy auspicious for good work.

Event.Name: SakunaKarana
Event.Description: For getting initiations into mantras Sakini Karana is propitious

Event.Name: BadNithyaYoga
Event.Description: Coming to the Yoga the 6th (Atiganda). 9th (Soola). 10th (Ganda), 17th (Vyatipata) and 27th (Vydhruti) have deleterious effects upon events which are started or commenced under them.

Event.Name: LagnaThyajya
Event.Description: Even when the ascendant is strong, certain parts of it which go under the name of Lagna tyajya should be rejected. In Aries, Taurus, Sagittarius and Virgo, the first three degrees should be avoided as it is supposed to be in the nature of a serpent (bhujanga) and hence destructive. In regard to Pisces, Capricorn, Cancer and Scorpio, the last (three degrees) has to be avoided as it is supposed to be presided over by the evil force of Rahu. The middle half ghati (13° 30' to 16° 30') should be rejected with regard to Gemini, Libra, Leo and Aquarius as it is ruled by an evil force termed Gridhra.

Event.Name: GoodPanchaka
Event.Description:
Panchaka (Five-Source Energy):
For matters of ordinary importance such as interviewing superiors or going on short journeys, a favourable Tarabala will do and there is no need to consider the panchaka. But in regard to very important ceremonies such as marriage, nuptials, entry into new houses, etc., this should be carefully looked into.
Five sources of planetary, stellar and zodiacal energies are involved. Take the number of the lunar day (from the 1st of the month), the number of the weekday, Sunday 1. etc.), the number of the constellation (from Aswini) and the number of the Lagna (from Aries). Add these together and divide the total by 9.

Event.Name: BadPanchaka
Event.Description:
Panchaka (Five-Source Energy):
For matters of ordinary importance such as interviewing superiors or going on short journeys, a favourable Tarabala will do and there is no need to consider the panchaka. But in regard to very important ceremonies such as marriage, nuptials, entry into new houses, etc., this should be carefully looked into.
Five sources of planetary, stellar and zodiacal energies are involved. Take the number of the lunar day (from the 1st of the month), the number of the weekday, Sunday 1. etc.), the number of the constellation (from Aswini) and the number of the Lagna (from Aries). Add these together and divide the total by 9.

Event.Name: BhriguShatka
Event.Description: The position of Venus in the 6th is injurious. This is especially so in regard to marriage. Even when Venus is exalted and associated with benefics, such a disposition is not approved.

Event.Name: Kujasthama
Event.Description: Mars should be avoided in the 8th house, as it indicates destruction of the object in view. In a marriage election chart. Mars in the 8th is unthinkable. Even if Mars is otherwise powerful, he should not occupy the 8th house.

Event.Name: GoodHairCutting
Event.Description: Shaving may be had in the constellations of Pushya, Punarvasu, Rcvati, Hasta, Sravana, Dhanista, Mrignsira, Aswini, Chitta, Jyeshta, Satabliislia and Swati. 4th, Gth and 14th lunar days as also New Moon and Full Moon days arc not desirable. And solar and lunar eclipses.

Event.Name: GoodNailCutting
Event.Description: Avoid Fridays and Saturdays - the 8th, 9th, 14th lunar days as well as New and Full Moon days.

Event.Name: FixedConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Rohini, Uttara, Uttarashadha and Uttarabhadra are supposed to be fixed constellations and they are favourable for coronations, laying the foundations of cities, sowing operations, planting trees and other permanent things.

Event.Name: SoftConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Chitta, Anuradha, Mrigasira and Revati are soft constellations. They are good for wearing new apparel, learning dancing, music and fine arts, sexual union and performance of auspicious ceremonies.

Event.Name: LightConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Aswini, Pushya, Hasta and Abhijit are light constellations, and they can be selected for putting ornamentation, pleasures and sports, administering medicine, starting industries and undertaking travels.

Event.Name: SharpConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Moola, Jyestha, Aridra and Aslesha are sharp in nature and they are favourable for incantations, invoking spirits, for imprisonment, murders, and separation of friends.

Event.Name: MovableConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Saravana, Dhanishta, Satabhisha, Punarvasu and Swati are movable stars and they are auspicious for acquiring vehicles, for gardening and for going on procession.

Event.Name: DreadfulConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Pubba, Poorvashadha and Poorvabhadra, Bharani and Makha are dreadful stars and they are suitable for nefarious schemes, poisoning, deceit, imprisonment, setting fire and other evil deeds.

Event.Name: MixedConstellationRuling
Event.Description: Krittika and Visakha are mixed constellations and during their influences, works of day-to-day importance can be undertaken.

Event.Name: BadForStartingAllAgriculture
Event.Description: While beginning all agricultural operations, see that the 8th house is unoccupied.

Event.Name: LagnaLordIsWeekdayLord
Event.Description: Lagna owned by the planet who is lord of the weekday in question.

Event.Name: GoodLunarDayAgriculture
Event.Description: All odd lunar days except the 9th are good. All even tithis except the 2nd and 4th should be avoided.

Event.Name: BadLagnaForAllAgriculture
Event.Description: Gemini: Not favourable for any planting being a barren sign. Leo: Not good for any planting, especially bad for underground plants such as potato.

Event.Name: GoodYogaForAllAgriculture
Event.Description: Good yoga for all agriculture is formed when: 1. A good lunar day for planting 2. Lagna owned by the planet who is lord of the weekday 3. Beginning all agricultural operations, see that the 8th house is unoccupied 4. No malefic rising sign (Gemini and Leo)

Event.Name: GoodAnySeedsSowing
Event.Description: Any seeds can be sown on a day ruled by Hasta, Chitta, Swati, Makha, Pushyami, Uttara, Uttarashadha, Uttarabhadra, Rohini, Revati, Aswini, Moola or Anuradha provided the lunar day is also propitious. Choose a Lagna, owned by the planet who is lord of the weekday in question.

Event.Name: Ekadashi
Event.Description: It is the 11th tithi. Special religious significance in Hindu tradition, usually it's observed by fasting.

Event.Name: NotAuspiciousDay
Event.Description: Tuesday and Saturday should be avoided for all good and auspicious works. Tuesday is not evil after midday

Event.Name: GoodPlanetsInLagna
Event.Description: Venus, Mercury or Jupiter in the ascendant will completely destroy all other adverse influences.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFloweringPlants
Event.Description: Good for planting flowering plants when Virgo is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingGarlic
Event.Description: Good for planting garlic when Aries is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingPeachAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting peach, plum, potatoes, radishes, onion sets and turnips when Taurus is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingTomatoesAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting beans, cabbage, corn, cucumber, lettuce, melons, pumpkins, tomatoes, cauliflower, water melons, and cereals when Cancer is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingGrains
Event.Description: Good for planting wheat, rye, barley, rice and other field crops when Libra is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingOnionAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting garlic and onion seeds when Scorpio is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingPepperAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting Pepper and other spring crops and garlic when Sagittarius is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingPotatoAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting potato, radishes and turnips when Capricorn is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingGrainsAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting all black cereals and grains when Aquarius is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingPumpkinsAndOthers
Event.Description: Good for planting cucumbers, pumpkins, radishes, water-melons and carrots when Pisces is rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingTrees
Event.Description: Good for planting trees in Rohini and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingSugarcane
Event.Description: Good for planting sugarcane in Punarvasu and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFlowerSeeds
Event.Description: Seeds of flower plants, and fruit-bearing creepers should be sown in the asterisms of Mriyusira, Punarvasu, Hasta, Chitta, Swati, Anuradha and Revati and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFruitTrees
Event.Description: Seedlings of long-lived fruit trees when Jupiter is in Lagna on Thursday OR Fruit trees may be planted when Sagittarius and Pisces are rising on Thursday and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFlowerTrees
Event.Description: Seedlings of flower trees when Venus is in Lagna on Friday and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFlowers
Event.Description: Seedlings of flower sown when Mars is in Lagna on Tuesday and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodForPlantingFlowerCuttings
Event.Description: Flower seeds and cuttings may be sown when Taurus or Libra rising and general good time for planting.

Event.Name: GoodRullingConstellation
Event.Description: Pushya rulling is a constellation par excellence that could be universally employed for all purposes, excepting of course marriage

Event.Name: BadRullingConstellation
Event.Description:
Certain constellations, apart from their being harmonious or otherwise disposed with reference to one's own Janma Nakshatra, should be avoided for certain specific purposes on account of their inherent evil natures. In fact, Bharani is condemned for all good work and it has to be scrupulously avoided for all good work.
When a constellation like Bharani(beta Arietis) is held to be constitutionally unfit for certain types of elections; it means that the vibrations emanating from it are destructive in character
Of the several Nakshatras, Bharani and Krittika should be avoided for all auspicious works as these two are said to be presided over by the god of death (Yama) and the god of fire (Agni) respectively. In urgent cases if the Lagna could be fortified, the dosha due to nakshatra may get neutralised. The last parts of Aslesha, Jyeshta and Revati should also be avoided.

Event.Name: GoodTakingInjections
Event.Description: Injections may be taken on Saturday or Monday. Aries, Taurus. Cancer and Virgo are auspicious. The 8th house must be unoccupied. See that Mercury is free from affliction; as otherwise the pain wilt be severe and nervous weakness may set in.

Event.Name: GoodSellingForProfit
Event.Description: Selling for Profit. - Let the Moon and Mercury be free from the conjunction or aspect of Mars. The Moon's situation in Taurus. Cancer or Pisces would greatly help the seller. Try to keep Mercury in a kendra from Lagna or at least in good aspect to Jupiter. Tuesday should be avoided. Monday, Wednesday and Thursday are the best. While Friday is unpropitious, Saturday is middling.

Event.Name: BavaKarana
Event.Description: Bava is auspicious for starting works of permanent importance.

Event.Name: TaitulaKarana
Event.Description: Thaithula is propitious for marriage

Event.Name: BhadraKarana
Event.Description: Bhadra is unfit for any good work but is eminently suitable for violent and cruel deeds.

Event.Name: JanmaNakshatraRulling
Event.Description: A day ruled by one's Janma Nakshatra is ordinarily held to be unfavourable for an election. But in regard to nuptials, sacrifices, first feeding, agriculture, upanayanam, coronation, buying lands, learning the alphabet, Janma Nakshatra is favourable without exception. But it is inauspicious for war, sexual union, shaving, taking medical treatment, travel and marriage. For a woman, Janma Nakshatra would be quite favourable for marriage.

Event.Name: BadForBuyingToolsUtensilsJewellery
Event.Description:
Buying Utensils, etc. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.
Buying Jewellery. As usual unfavourable lunar days and asterisms should be avoided.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingBrassVessels
Event.Description: Buying Utensils, etc. - Place Jupiter in good aspect to the Moon while buying brass vessels. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingCopperVessels
Event.Description: Buying Utensils, etc. - Place Jupiter in good aspect to Mars when buying vessels of copper. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingSteelIronVessels
Event.Description: Buying Utensils, etc. - Place Jupiter in good aspect to Saturn if steel and iron. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingSilverVessels
Event.Description: Buying Utensils, etc. - Place Jupiter in good aspect to ascendant if of silver. Avoid the asterisms of Aslesha. Moola and Jyeshta. For buying tools, similarly avoid the 8th and 9th lunar days and New Moon.

Event.Name: GoodForBuyingJewellery
Event.Description: Buying Jewellery. - The Sun and the Moon should be well situated and aspected. As usual unfavourable lunar days and asterisms should be avoided.

Event.Name: GoodPlanetsIn11th
Event.Description: The mere presence of the Moon or the Sun in the 11th will act as an antidote for other evils obtaining in the horoscope.

Event.Name: GoodPlanetsInKendra
Event.Description: Jupiter or Venus in a kendra (quadrant) and malefics in 3, 6 or 11 will remove all the flaws arising on account of unfavourable weekday, constellation, lunar day and yoga.

Event.Name: Sunrise
Event.Description: It has been acknowledged that it is the moment at which the centre of the solar disc rises at the eastern horizon, that marks the sunrise at the particular place. It must also be noted that on account of the refraction of the solar rays, due to the various strata enveloping the earth, the Sun is not really at the horizon where he appears to be so but is really below the horizon by about a few minutes of arc (Rekha). But we can take the apparent time as almost correct and need not worry ourselves with the so called delicate correct time of rising.

Event.Name: Sunset
Event.Description: It has been acknowledged that it is the moment at which the centre of the solar disc rises at the western horizon, that marks the sunset at the particular place. It must also be noted that on account of the refraction of the solar rays, due to the various strata enveloping the earth, the Sun is not really at the horizon where he appears to be so but is really below the horizon by about a few minutes of arc (Rekha). But we can take the apparent time as almost correct and need not worry ourselves with the so called delicate correct time of setting.

Event.Name: Midday
Event.Description: This is marked when the centre of the Sun is exactly on the meridian of the place. The apparent noon is almost the same for all places.

Event.Name: GoodChandrabala
Event.Description: To be at its best, the Moon should not occupy in the election chart, a position that happens to represent the 6th, 8th or 12th from the persons Janma Rasi

Event.Name: BadChandrabala
Event.Description:
To be at its best, the Moon should not occupy in the election chart, a position that happens to represent the 6th, 8th or 12th from the persons Janma Rasi
Exceptions: Chandrashtama (8th) shows no evil when the Moon is waxing and occupies a benefic sign and a benefic Navamsa, or when there is Tarabala. The sting is lost when the Moon and the 8th lord are friends.

Event.Name: TarabalaJanmaStrong
Event.Description: Janma: danger to body 1st Paryaya or cycle : the evil suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaJanmaMiddling
Event.Description: Janma: danger to body 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaJanmaWeak
Event.Description: Janma: danger to body 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaSampatStrong
Event.Description: Sampat: wealth and prosperity 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaSampatMiddling
Event.Description: Sampat: wealth and prosperity 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaSampatWeak
Event.Description: Sampat: wealth and prosperity 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaVipatStrong
Event.Description:
Vipat: dangers, losses and accidents 1st Paryaya or cycle : the evil suggested holds good in full
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaVipatMiddling
Event.Description:
Vipat: dangers, losses and accidents 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be only fifty percent.
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaVipatWeak
Event.Description:
Vipat: dangers, losses and accidents 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be almost negligible
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaKshemaStrong
Event.Description: Kshema: prosperity 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaKshemaMiddling
Event.Description: Kshema: prosperity 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaKshemaWeak
Event.Description: Kshema: prosperity 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaPratyakStrong
Event.Description: Pratyak: obstacles 1st Paryaya or cycle : the evil suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaPratyakMiddling
Event.Description: Pratyak: obstacles 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaPratyakWeak
Event.Description: Pratyak: obstacles 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaSadhanaStrong
Event.Description: Sadhana: realisation of ambitions 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaSadhanaMiddling
Event.Description: Sadhana: realisation of ambitions 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaSadhanaWeak
Event.Description: Sadhana: realisation of ambitions 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaNaidhanaStrong
Event.Description:
Naidhana: dangers 1st Paryaya or cycle : the evil suggested holds good in full
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaNaidhanaMiddling
Event.Description:
Naidhana: dangers 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be only fifty percent.
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaNaidhanaWeak
Event.Description:
Naidhana: dangers 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the evil is said to be almost negligible
It is better to avoid Vipat and Naidhana stars for all important undertakings - long journeys, marriage, starting of an enterprise, etc., even if such a star happens to fall in the 3rd-cycle, unless there are other counteracting factors.

Event.Name: TarabalaMitraStrong
Event.Description: Mitra: good 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaMitraMiddling
Event.Description: Mitra: good 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaMitraWeak
Event.Description: Mitra: good 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: TarabalaParamaMitraStrong
Event.Description: Parama Mitra: very favourable 1st Paryaya or cycle : the good suggested holds good in full

Event.Name: TarabalaParamaMitraMiddling
Event.Description: Parama Mitra: very favourable 2nd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be only fifty percent.

Event.Name: TarabalaParamaMitraWeak
Event.Description: Parama Mitra: very favourable 3rd Paryaya or cycle : the good is said to be almost negligible

Event.Name: Papashadvargas
Event.Description: Papashadvargs : Malefics should not be strong in shadvargas in an election chart. This event idicates that malefics are strong in shadvargas

Event.Name: GoodMoonSignForSelling
Event.Description: Selling for Profit. - The Moon's situation in Taurus. Cancer or Pisces would greatly help the seller.

Event.Name: GoodWeekdayForSelling
Event.Description: Selling for Profit. - Monday, Wednesday and Thursday are the best.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When the Sun traverses through the Rasi occupied by the Moon, the person suffers from loss of wealth, loss of prestige, sickness and will have many obstacles and aimless travels.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When he transits in the 2nd house, there will be loss of wealth, he will suffer deceit, he will have full of financial worries.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: In the 3rd house there will be advent of money, happiness, relief from diseases, recognition from superiors, honours and courage.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: In the 4th house, there will be diseases, constant attacks from opponents, no peace of mind, pressure from creditors, and sorrow and misery.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: The Sun transiting the 5th will cause mental agitation, ill-health, embarrassment and accidents.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: The Sun in the 6th gives rise to release from sorrows, worries and troubles, destruction of enemies and peace of mind.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: The Sun transiting the 7th, produces wearisome travelling, colic and anal troubles, humiliation and sickness.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: In the 8th, Sun's progress gives rise to quarrels with friends, diseases, high blood pressure, royal and official displeasure.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: The Sun's transit in the 9th house will cause to the native danger, humiliation, dependency, disappointment and separation.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: One will accomplish his desire and plans, and success will attend on all kinds or undertakings when the Sun is in the 10th.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: In the 11th, the passage of the Sun will confer on a person honour, health, wealth and success.

Event.Name: SunGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When the Sun passes through the 12th house, there will be sorrow, creation of a situation which causes loss to everything, quarrels and ill-health.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When the Moon transits the sign occupied by her at the time of birth of a person, the native will get excellent food, bed and clothes.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When the Moon passes through the 2nd house, loss of respect and of money and obstacles in the way of success are to be predicted.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: In the 3rd house, the native gets clothes, pleasure from wife and finance.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: In the 4th, he becomes mentally uneasy

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: In the 5th, suffers from humility, ill-health, pain of mind and other obstacles

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: In the 6th, enjoys wealth, health, comfort, redemption from enemies.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: 7th house, conveyances, good food and financial equilibrium.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: The Moon transiting the 8th produces misery, ill-health and fear from unexpected sources.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: In the 9th from herself, pain of mind, chest pain, fatigue of body and the like are caused.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When the Moon passes through the 10th house, success will attend in every sphere of activity

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: In the 11th house, the person will enjoy prosperity, will get wealth and new friends.

Event.Name: MoonGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When the Moon transits through the 12th sign. He suffers from accidents and injuries.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Mars passes through tbe sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, be will suffer from troubles.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: In the 2nd house from the Moon displeasure of king, and suffering from quarrels, from enemies and disgrace is indicated. There will be fear from thieves and the body will be afflicted with bilious and windy complaints.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: Mars transiting the 3rd gives rise to gain of objects, pleasure from children, good health, access to riches and new clothes.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: In the 4th sign, Mars produces evil results such as fever, digestive troubles, blood discharges and depravity of character.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: Enemies will increase, fresh diseases will make their appearance and mental peace will be completely absent when Mars passes through the 5th house.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: In the 6th house, relief from troubles, worries and ill-health should be predicted; he leads an independent life, obtains riches and becomes pretty cheerful.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When transiting the 7th, tbe native quarrels with wife or husband, eye troubles, stomach-ache, indigestion, etc., are also likely to be felt.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: Mars transiting in the 8th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: Mars transiting in the 9th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.In addition, the subject becomes extremely weak.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: His transiting the 10th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: His transiting the 11th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve.

Event.Name: MarsGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: In the 12th house, however,he will suffer from various expenses, troubles, diseases of the eye, pinpricks from an angry wife, from bilious complaints and various other worries.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at time of birth of a person, such person will suffer loss of wealth caused by the advice of wicked men, by talebearers, by imprisonment and quarrels. He will, besides, receive disagreeable intelligence when in his journey.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the 2nd house, the person will suffer disgrace but gains success and wealth.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When he passes through tbe 3rd house, the subject will get friends, will be afraid of troubles from the king and from his enemies, he will quit his place due to his wicked deeds.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the 4th house, the person's kinsmen and family will increase and there will be much gain.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: In the 5th house, the person will quarrel with his wife and sons and will not enjoy the company of an excellent wife.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: In the 6th house,the person will be liked by all and will gain renown.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: In the 7th house, the person's appearance becomes less bright and there will be quarrels.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the 8th house, the person will get sons, success, clothes and wealth and will become happy and powerful.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When he passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will meet with obstacles in his work.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: In the 10th house, the person's enemies will meet with ruin and the person will get wealth, will enjoy the company of his wife and will be dressed in the flannel.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Mercury passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, comfort, sons, women, friends and conveyance and will be happy and will receive good intelligence.

Event.Name: MercuryGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: In the 12th, the person will suffer disgrace from his enemies, will suffer from diseases and will not enjoy the company of a good wife.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, such person will lose his wealth and intelligence, will quit his place and will suffer from many quarrels.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will have no enemies and will enjoy wealth and women.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will quit his place and will meet with obstacles in his work.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from troubles caused by his kinsmen, will become patient and resigned and will delight in nothing.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will get servants, prosperity, sons, elephants, houses, bullocks, gold, women, clothes, gems and good qualities.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be so much afflicted at heart that he will take no delight in the agreeable faces of beautiful women, in the music of the peacock and the cuckoo and in houses made pleasant by the frolic of children playing like the young of the deer.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 7th house from the Moon, the person will enjoy good bed, the company of an excellent woman, wealth, good meals, flowers, conveyance and the like and be will be of good speech and intelligence.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 8th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from imprisonment, diseases, heavy grief, the fatigue of journey and serious illness.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will become efficient at work and influential and he will get sons, success in work, wealth and gain.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 10th house from the Moon, the person will quit his place and suffer loss of health and wealth.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 11th house, the person will return to his country and will recover his health and wealth.

Event.Name: JupiterGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When Jupiter passes through the 12th house, the person will suffer grief in his return journey.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, such a person will enjoy excellent perfumes, flowers, clothes, houses, bed, meals and women.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will get sons, wealth, grain and presents from the king; will have a prosperous family, will enjoy flowers and gems and will be of bright appearance.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will become influential, wealthy and respectable and will get clothes. His enemies will meet with ruin.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 4th house, the person will get friends and will become greatly powerful.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 5th house, the person will be happy, will get kinsmen, sons, wealth and friends and will not suffer defeat by the enemy.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will suffer disgrace, will be afflicted with diseases and will be exposed to danger.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 7th house, the person will suffer injuries through women.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 8th house from the Moon, the person will get houses, articles of lacquer and beautiful women.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 9th house from the Moon, the person will become virtuous, happy and wealthy and he will get plenty or clothes.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 10th house from the Moon, the person will suffer disgrace and will also suffer quarrels.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will get wealth of his friends and will also get perfumes and clothes.

Event.Name: VenusGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When Venus passes through the 12th house, the person will get very few clothes.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of his birth, such person will suffer from poison and from fire, will quit his kinsmen, will suffer from imprisonment and torture, will travel to foreign lands and live with his friend there, will suffer miseries, loss of wealth and or sons, will suffer also from the fatigues of foot journey and from humiliation.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will suffer from loss of beauty and comfort, will become weak and will get wealth from other men but will not enjoy this wealth long.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, servants, articles of enjoyment, camels, buffaloes, elephants, asses and horses. He will become influential, happy, free from disease and will become greatly powerful and will defeat his enemies in fight.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his friends, wealth, and wife and ever suspecting evil in everything, will never feel happy.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his sons and wealth and will suffer from quarrels.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be freed from his enemies and diseases and will enjoy the company of women.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When he passes through the 9th house, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Besides that, suffer from hatred, chest pain, imprisonment and in consequence will not properly observe the daily duties.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 10th house, the person will get work and will suffer loss of wealth, learning and fame.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will become cruel and will get women and wealth.

Event.Name: SaturnGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When Saturn passes through the 12th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from much grief.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the sign occupied by the Moon at the time of his birth, such person will suffer from poison and from fire, will quit his kinsmen, will suffer from imprisonment and torture, will travel to foreign lands and live with his friend there, will suffer miseries, loss of wealth and or sons, will suffer also from the fatigues of foot journey and from humiliation.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 2nd house from the Moon, the person will suffer from loss of beauty and comfort, will become weak and will get wealth from other men but will not enjoy this wealth long.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 3rd house from the Moon, the person will get wealth, servants, articles of enjoyment, camels, buffaloes, elephants, asses and horses. He will become influential, happy, free from disease and will become greatly powerful and will defeat his enemies in fight.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 4th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his friends, wealth, and wife and ever suspecting evil in everything, will never feel happy.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 5th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his sons and wealth and will suffer from quarrels.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 6th house from the Moon, the person will be freed from his enemies and diseases and will enjoy the company of women.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 7th or 8th house from the Moon, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: When he passes through the 9th house, the person will be separated from his wife and sons, will travel on foot in a pitiable condition. Besides that, suffer from hatred, chest pain, imprisonment and in consequence will not properly observe the daily duties.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 10th house, the person will get work and will suffer loss of wealth, learning and fame.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 11th house from the Moon, the person will become cruel and will get women and wealth.

Event.Name: RahuGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: When Rahu passes through the 12th house from the Moon, the person will suffer from much grief.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse1
Event.Description: When Ketu passes through tbe sign occupied by the Moon at the time of birth of a person, be will suffer from troubles.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse2
Event.Description: In the 2nd house from the Moon displeasure of king, and suffering from quarrels, from enemies and disgrace is indicated. There will be fear from thieves and the body will be afflicted with bilious and windy complaints.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse3
Event.Description: Ketu transiting the 3rd gives rise to gain of objects, pleasure from children, good health, access to riches and new clothes.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse4
Event.Description: In the 4th sign, Ketu produces evil results such as fever, digestive troubles, blood discharges and depravity of character.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse5
Event.Description: Enemies will increase, fresh diseases will make their appearance and mental peace will be completely absent when Ketu passes through the 5th house.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse6
Event.Description: In the 6th house, relief from troubles, worries and ill-health should be predicted; he leads an independent life, obtains riches and becomes pretty cheerful.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse7
Event.Description: When transiting the 7th, tbe native quarrels with wife or husband, eye troubles, stomach-ache, indigestion, etc., are also likely to be felt.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse8
Event.Description: Ketu transiting in the 8th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse9
Event.Description: Ketu transiting in the 9th produces quite unfavorable effects, such as discharging of blood, loss of wealth, disgrace and mental worry.In addition, the subject becomes extremely weak.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse10
Event.Description: His transiting the 10th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse11
Event.Description: His transiting the 11th produces quite favourable results. Amounts due will be realised. Success will attend on his ventures. Business will improve.

Event.Name: KetuGocharaInHouse12
Event.Description: In the 12th house, however,he will suffer from various expenses, troubles, diseases of the eye, pinpricks from an angry wife, from bilious complaints and various other worries.

Event.Name: AriesSunDasa
Event.Description: The Dasa of the Sun in Aries in deep exaltation.- Sudden gains in cattle and wealth, much traveling in eastern countries, residence in foreign countries, quarrels among friends and relations, pleasure trips and picnic parties and company of beautiful women.

Event.Name: TaurusSunDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - Increase in landed properties, fame among relations and friends, cultivation of love and reverence for holy people and saints.

Event.Name: GeminiSunDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Much wealth, education, inclination to interest oneself in music and such other fine arts, and generally happy and cheerful.

Event.Name: CancerSunDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Political success, always gay and happy, traveling in foreign countries and increase in lands, houses and wealth.

Event.Name: LeoSunDasa
Event.Description: Leo - Respect from kings and noble personages, righteous conduct, birth of children and respect among children.

Event.Name: VirgoSunDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - Suffering off and on from physical complaints, loss of cattle, wealth and house and misunderstandings with close relatives and friends.

Event.Name: LibraSunDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Reduced to poverty, troubled by enemies, failure in undertakings, death of brothers and friends and miserable and complicated life.

Event.Name: ScorpioSunDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Starting new schemes and enterprises, realization of many ambitious things, travelling in hilly tracts and countries.

Event.Name: SagittariusSunDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Happiness, success in undertakings, good health, destruction of enemies, satisfaction in every way.

Event.Name: CapricornusSunDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - A wandering life, loss of patrimony, self-respect and good name, misunderstanding among his own people.

Event.Name: AquariusSunDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Mental worries, loss or illness to wife, loss of property and wealth.

Event.Name: PiscesSunDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - Gains in wealth, auspicious celebrations, respect among relations, increase in family members and smooth sailing in every way.

Event.Name: AriesMoonDasa
Event.Description: The Moon in Aries - Physical and mental happiness, gains in wealth and perfect contentment.

Event.Name: TaurusMoonDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - Increase in fame and name, collection of enormous wealth, mental and physical happiness.

Event.Name: GeminiMoonDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Progress in education and acquiring of much immovable and movable properties.

Event.Name: CancerMoonDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Addition in wealth, success in litigation, unexpected findings of treasure, travels.

Event.Name: LeoMoonDasa
Event.Description: Leo - Progress in education, much gains from unexpected sources.

Event.Name: VirgoMoonDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - Death of serious illness to mother, worries from enemies and swindlers, mental and physical restlessness.

Event.Name: LibraMoonDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Gains in wealth, increase in friends, visits to holy places and shrines, realisation of schemes and destruction of enemies.

Event.Name: ScorpioMoonDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Fear from political heads, destruction of relatives, disappointments in every respect, loss of wealth, liberty and honor at risk and much mental uneasiness.

Event.Name: SagittariusMoonDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Domestic happiness and felicity, celebration of happy functions, accumulation of wealth and undisturbed progress of normal private affairs.

Event.Name: CapricornusMoonDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - Increase in lands and houses and wealth, success in every new enterprise, pilgrimages to holy places and success in litigation.

Event.Name: AquariusMoonDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Destruction of property, fear from political authorities, mental worries from enemies, misunderstandings among relatives and friends.

Event.Name: PiscesMoonDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - Taking charges of fresh office, reciting religious texts and moral codes and easy access to anything coveted without effort.

Event.Name: AriesMarsDasa
Event.Description: Aries - Acquisition of wealth, increase in reputation and respect, much gain.

Event.Name: TaurusMarsDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - Destruction of enemies, success in all struggles, respect from elders and rulers and good produce from lands.

Event.Name: GeminiMarsDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Access to great wealth, precious· stones and me~ agricultural success, general success in all undertakings.

Event.Name: CancerMarsDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Danger from enemies, of honour and reputation, domestic disharmony and misunderstandings among brothers or close relatives.

Event.Name: LeoMarsDasa
Event.Description: Leo - Happy and successful all through the period of 7 years, taste in fine arts and material gains through them, increase of income from house and lands.

Event.Name: VirgoMarsDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - Beneficial results, successful termination of educational pursuits, ability to address meetings and deliver lectures, and happiness from relatives and friends.

Event.Name: LibraMarsDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Most miserable life, misunderstandings with cousins and brothers, death of wife and children, loss of wealth and grains and mortgaging of landed property.

Event.Name: ScorpioMarsDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Increase in wealth, good earnings, friendship and intimacy with exalted personages, love for own people, always happy and active.

Event.Name: SagittariusMarsDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Earnings from political or royal sources, courting their friendships, destruction of enemies and realisation of all hopes and desires.

Event.Name: CapricornusMarsDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - Success in battles and respect for military skill, gains from quadrupeds and increase in wealth.

Event.Name: AquariusMarsDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Great hardships and difficulties, misunderstandings with rulers and the immediate superiors in office, unpleasant relations with mother and servants.

Event.Name: PiscesMarsDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - Much wealth, general success and happiness. bumper crops in lands, prosperity and acquisition of house and business, respect as a learned man, great reputation.

Event.Name: AriesRahuDasa
Event.Description: Rahu In Aries - Auspicious celebrations in the house, recitations of sacred texts, acquisition of tracts of land, perfect domestic happiness, respect from rulers and a life of harmony in every respect.

Event.Name: TaurusRahuDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - Pilgrimages to shrines and holy places, increase in philosophical knowledge, entertainments, gains from cattle and dealings with quadrupeds.

Event.Name: GeminiRahuDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Multiplication of enemies, always peevish and short tempered, fear from police and magistrates, sickness to wife and family, misunderstandings and disfavour.

Event.Name: CancerRahuDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Serving the suffering, humanitarian propaganda, zeal and enthusiasm for national service, gains and increase in wealth, riches and honour and great reputation.

Event.Name: LeoRahuDasa
Event.Description: Leo - Fear of imprisonment of fraud and deception or misappropriation or political offenses, destruction of property and mental worries distractions.

Event.Name: VirgoRahuDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - Gain in wealth, general prosperity and success, acquisition of new lands, elevation to exalted positions, respect for learning, sexual happiness and domestic harmony, birth of children and sudden access to much wealth.

Event.Name: LibraRahuDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Destruction of property, loss of wealth, waste of agricultural products, loss of position, fear of imprisonment, residence in foreign countries-rather in exile, many miseries, hardships, business failure, litigation troubles and physical and mental sufferings.

Event.Name: ScorpioRahuDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Rahu is debilitated here and as such, causes great havoc to the native. The results in Rahu's Dasa will be :-abortion, loss of children, inclination to bid farewell to moral aspect of life, failure in business enterprises and mental discontentment.

Event.Name: SagittariusRahuDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Acquisition of wealth, sudden and unexpected gain without effort, great success in any undertakings, loss of near and dear relatives and mental unrest.

Event.Name: CapricornusRahuDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - Sudden promotions to higher positions, recognition of one's merits by the State and rulers, marriage festivities at home, increase of wealth and general prosperity.

Event.Name: AquariusRahuDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Orphanage, disappointments, mental derangement and affection, sorrowful news, loss of wife or children, premature death and mean instincts.

Event.Name: PiscesRahuDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - Great fear in life from thieves, swindlers and such people, inclination to matrimonial alliance, progress of education, some gains, ill health and mental uneasiness. Rahu in Pisces gives mixed results - his position, viz., whether he is in a friendly or unfriendly sign, in the house of loss or gain, wife or children, etc., should be correctly determined.

Event.Name: AriesJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Jupiter in Aries - Acquisition of landed property, general prosperity and success in all undertakings and litigations, elevation to a responsible office or appointment as a trustee and great respect from his or her own people.

Event.Name: TaurusJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - If a king or a president - access to new territories, fresh treaties and pacts, if an ordinary person - acquisition of wealth, establishment of business on a firm foundation, gains in trade and agriculture, increase in lands and cattle, respect from friends and foes.

Event.Name: GeminiJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Death of wife if married or sweet heart, loss of children, brothers and cousins, deportation, fear from rulers and mental uneasiness.

Event.Name: CancerJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Jupiter is exalted here and gives all beneficial results such as much political success, promotions, exalted positions, humanitarian work, national service, acquisition of wealth from unexpected sources and without efforts, journalistic success, minister of education or lands and perfect harmony in domestic life.

Event.Name: LeoJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Leo - Respect from rulers, gain of lands, much agricultural produce, and realisation of one's own desires and ambitions.

Event.Name: VirgoJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - Residence in foreign countries, destruction of wife and property, loss of wealth, misunderstandings among relatives, strife, body ill-health and symptoms of nervous troubles and diseases.

Event.Name: LibraJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Residence in desolate places, dissolute and shameful life, active part in perverted social reform, selfish interests, great and unbearable difficulties and troubles, tendency to create factions in societies and families.

Event.Name: ScorpioJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Mental calm and happiness, acquisition of new lands and estates, undisturbed progress and religious worship and philosophical discourses and triumph of spiritual influences over sensual passions, reputation at stake if aspected by malefics.

Event.Name: SagittariusJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Many sons, much wealth, success in every undertaking, increase in relations and family members. widespread fame and perfect happiness.

Event.Name: CapricornusJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - Death or illness of children, wife always ill, loss of property, reputation and self-respect, irreligious acts, sacrilegious attacks upon sacred institutions, predominance of mean motives, liable to prosecution and the upspringing of numerous enemies.

Event.Name: AquariusJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Consumption and fear from wild beasts, animals, bad luck, many hardships and loss of wealth.

Event.Name: PiscesJupiterDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - Much fame throughout this long period of 16 years, high education and gt1in from exhibition of knowledge, acquisition of property and general success and happiness.

Event.Name: AriesSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Saturn In Aries - The worst period in a man's career, unexpected losses, disappointments in every undertaking, misunderstandings among relatives and friends and increase in the number of enemies.

Event.Name: TaurusSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - Success and gains in agricultural operations, much prosperity to the cattle and other domestic animals, great income, and access to things desired.

Event.Name: GeminiSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Recognition of his services, great humanitarian work, profits in speculations and trade, respect from rulers, political success, reputation, fame and much general happiness.

Event.Name: CancerSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Miseries and calamities, family strife, increase of enemies, trouble from relatives and physical diseases and mental affliction.

Event.Name: LeoSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Leo - A period of uneasiness, distrust, disappointments and unrest, misappropriation of money and consequent prosecution if Saturn is afflicted powerfully, hatred by all and courting death as a source of relief from mental worries.

Event.Name: VirgoSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - Elevation to exalted positions, royal favour, business success and establishment of fame and reputation.

Event.Name: LibraSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Travelling in countries inhabited by Christians and Moslems, establishment of fresh branches if proprietor of a business concern, acceptance of invitations for public lectures and great honour and respect throughout the long period of 19 years and perfect domestic happiness.

Event.Name: ScorpioSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Odium of superiors, disliked and hated by all, loss or prestige, self-respect and fame and destruction and damage to property and possessions.

Event.Name: SagittariusSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Inclination to study philosophical and religious treatises and success in such studies, auspicious occasions like marriage ceremonies, etc., at home and happiness and mental peace throughout.

Event.Name: CapricornusSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - Increase in lands, gains in wealth and business, friendship with great and illustrious personages.

Event.Name: AquariusSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Great travelling in Western countries, success in litigation, mental happiness and acquisition of wealth.

Event.Name: PiscesSaturnDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - Pilgrimage to sacred shrines and holy places, indifference towards sectarian restrictions and observances, sorrows, misery and unrest.

Event.Name: AriesMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Mercury in Aries - Marriage, performance of religious and social work, charity, increase in religiousness and intelligence, favour of rulers, gains from cultivation. cattle, precious stones and conveyances and happiness through these.

Event.Name: TaurusMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - Great happiness, sexual contact with beautiful young women, getting titles and name, ornaments and authority over men, acquaintance of sweet girls and their company and practice of music and kindred sciences.

Event.Name: GeminiMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Access to great intellectual treasures, increase in knowledge, successful termination of educational career, acquisition of fame and wealth, happiness from wife and children, marriage ceremonies and recitation of sacred scriptures.

Event.Name: CancerMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Degradation, change of residence, fines and imprisonments, penalties. confinement in chains, hatred of relations, loss of lands. failure of crops and comity with all.

Event.Name: LeoMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Leo - Good courage and elevation, travelling in hilly and mountainous tracts, acquisition of wealth from various countries, progress in knowledge, expeditions to mountains, caves and similar places, marriage and great reputation.

Event.Name: VirgoMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - The most auspicious and happy period of life, favour of kings, admirers and royal courts and great success in them, undisturbed health, marriage in the house, increase in intelligence, religiousness, charitable foundings, and unexpected gains.

Event.Name: LibraMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Great works published in the native's name, favour of wealthy and educated people without effort, and leadership over men.

Event.Name: ScorpioMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Loss or wife, children, riches, mental troubles, losses from merchandise, great hatred of people and relations and loss of reputation and power.

Event.Name: SagittariusMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Success in education, meeting with learned and religious people, worship of holy men, virtuous and charitable deeds, travelling in Eastern countries, inclination for marital enterprises and great exhilaration.

Event.Name: CapricornusMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - Success in trade, inception of new business-like trades in tanneries, leather goods, glassware, etc., recitation of religious scriptures. Godly contemplations, patronage of kings, destruction of foes and enemies and general success in life.

Event.Name: AquariusMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Acquisition of paraphernalia, access to good and much wealth, indulging in a pleasurely life and good fame and name.

Event.Name: PiscesMercuryDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - Trouble from thieves, dysentery, destruction of relations, litigation, quarrels with relatives, mental derangement, nervous breakdown and failure in attempts.

Event.Name: AriesKetuDasa
Event.Description: Ketu in Aries - Disgrace, troubles from relatives, loss of property, cattle and other domestic animals, constant travels in Eastern countries, great hardship, sudden quarrels, loss of mother and wife or their serious sickness, want of prudence and capacity in private matters.

Event.Name: TaurusKetuDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - Many dangers, death of wife, acquisition of wealth through evil ways and means, sexual sorrows, visits to sacred shrines and holy waters, inclination to religious study and success in it, compunction and in the end appeasing sins by resort to foul stratagems.

Event.Name: GeminiKetuDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Good health, happiness, elevation to responsible and exalted positions, rounding of sacred institutions, good food, advent of relations and in later years venereal troubles, death of near relation and loss of reputation and self-respect.

Event.Name: CancerKetuDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Many dangers, disturbances from his place and a period of exile, serious sickness to wife, parents or children, and if badly afflicted, their death, quarrels with friends, initiation into the mysteries of philosophical knowledge.

Event.Name: LeoKetuDasa
Event.Description: Leo - Increase of lands, cultivation. progress in education, heated debates and discussions on philosophical and scientific subjects with great scholars and eminent people, attracted by females and company with them, travels in mountainous tracts and billy countries to spread any righteous cause, and treated to great musical entertainment.

Event.Name: VirgoKetuDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - Fear from fires, weapons and poisonous gases, beasts and reptiles, destruction of dear lives, properties and self-respect, unrighteous acts and nasty venereal complaints.

Event.Name: LibraKetuDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Happiness and prosperity to wife or husband, self and children, enmity of relations, gains from gold and precious stones, headache, heart disease, nervous breakdown, trouble in the anus and much discontent.

Event.Name: ScorpioKetuDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Living dependent on relations, sycophant acts, acquisition of much wealth. loss of few children, gains from lands, contraction of new friendship from among the members of the fair sex and liable to suffer from venereal complaints.

Event.Name: SagittariusKetuDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Perfect domestic harmony and happiness, favour from aristocrats, progress in education, religious discussions, moral elevation and manifestation of a spirit of tolerance and equality.

Event.Name: CapricornusKetuDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - Misappropriation of private and governmental funds and consequent prosecution, wife or husband catching consumption and such diseases, death of a few children, anxiety about everything, misunderstanding with relations and disgrace and disappointments.

Event.Name: AquariusKetuDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Hating all and hated by all, incurring the displeasure of superiors, pessimistic about every hope, abject dependency and servile flattery; in the end, happiness and prosperity to wife and children.

Event.Name: PiscesKetuDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - Learned discussions, general success, helping the suffering, mental depression, promotion, acquisition of fertile lands, favour of the superiors and moneyed people, moral and religious devotions, vigorous and clear understanding, travel on water to distant countries and respect there.

Event.Name: AriesVenusDasa
Event.Description: Venus in Aries - Residence in palatial buildings, acquaintance with noble personages, wearing good clothes, good earnings, spread of fame, much respect, birth of child, happy sexual relations and praised by friends and enemies.

Event.Name: TaurusVenusDasa
Event.Description: Taurus - A life of great ease and indulgence throughout the period of 20 years, enjoyment of much happiness, company of beautiful girls and joy through association with them, travels on seas to foreign countries particularly southern, all ambitions of life fairly realised, redemption from debts, symptoms of venereal troubles.

Event.Name: GeminiVenusDasa
Event.Description: Gemini - Gain of territory, affording protection to brothers, sisters, cousins and paternal uncles and aunts, gain of vehicles, increase of reputation, children. harmony with wife, mental peace and a check over inclination to indulge in loose life.

Event.Name: CancerVenusDasa
Event.Description: Cancer - Paroxysms of grief and terror, destruction of property, discontent with relations, increase of enemies, loss of wealth, disturbance to good work and some mental ease in the end.

Event.Name: LeoVenusDasa
Event.Description: Leo - Mental disease and sorrow, troubles from fires, poisons and hurts, evil women, foul language and mental disorder, exile, and aimless wanderings in deserts and woods to evade detection by law, dangerous sickness to the better half or a child, stigma on self-respect due to mean fellows and inclination to conceal true identity.

Event.Name: VirgoVenusDasa
Event.Description: Virgo - Quarrels with wife or husband and separation from him or her, mortgage of all property, trouble in the generative organ often leading to surgical operation, symptoms of arthritis, troubles relating to nervous breakdown, mental unrest, separation from relatives and friends and much grief and sorrow.

Event.Name: LibraVenusDasa
Event.Description: Libra - Great reputation, gain of wealth from royal patronage, comforts, good enjoyment of life, luxurious invitations and worships of mammon and a period of extreme sensuality.

Event.Name: ScorpioVenusDasa
Event.Description: Scorpio - Hatred for all, many miseries and troubles, serious risks, vengeance against relatives, loss of wealth and property, mental affliction and imbalance.

Event.Name: SagittariusVenusDasa
Event.Description: Sagittarius - Much fame and name, religious _and philosophical studies, recitation of sacred writings, regard for holy people and ascetics, success in any undertakings and general prosperity.

Event.Name: CapricornusVenusDasa
Event.Description: Capricorn - Travels in foreign lands, freedom from domestic worries, discussion with learned people, progress in general education, acquaintance with low class people, development of perverted ideas of social or religious reform and success in all endeavors.

Event.Name: AquariusVenusDasa
Event.Description: Aquarius - Acquisition of fresh property, a good library, lands and houses, honours and unexpected gains, love for Christian or Islamic literature and its studies, stray intercourse with senile women, domestic happiness and harmony.

Event.Name: PiscesVenusDasa
Event.Description: Pisces - High political power and great success, promotion to responsible office, acts of charity and generosity, exercise of prudence in official matters and perfect happiness in domestic life and smooth-sailing in every respect.

Event.Name: SunDasaSunBhukti
Event.Description: Unpleasantness with relatives and superiors, anxieties, headache. pain in the ear, some tendency to urinary or kidney troubles, sickness, fear from rulers and enemies, fear of death, loss of money, danger to father if the Sun is afflicted, stomachache and travels, gains through religious people, mental sufferings, a wandering life in a foreign country.

Event.Name: SunDasaMoonBhukti
Event.Description: The Moon's sub-period-6 months Winning favour from superiors, increase in business, fresh enterprises, troubles through women, eye troubles, many relatives and friends, indulgence in idle pastimes, jaundice and kindred ailments, new clothes and ornaments, will be happy, healthy, good meals, respect among relatives.

Event.Name: SunDasaMarsBhukti
Event.Description: Mars' sub-period-4 months, 6 days. Rheumatic and similar troubles, quarrels, danger of enteric fever, dysentery, troubles to relatives, loss of money by thefts or wasteful expenses, failures, acquisition of wealth in the form of gold and gems, royal favour leading to prosperity, contraction and transmission of bilious and other diseases, mental worries, danger from fire, ill-health, loss of reputation, sorrow.

Event.Name: SunDasaRahuBhukti
Event.Description: Rahu's sub-period -10 months, 24 days. Many troubles, changes according to the position of Rahu, family disputes, journeys, pang of death, trouble from relatives and enemies, loss of peace or mental misery, loss of money, sorrows, unsuccessful in all attempts, fear of thieves and reptiles, scandals.

Event.Name: SunDasaJupiterBhukti
Event.Description: Jupiter's sub-perlod-9 months, 18 days. Benefits from friends and acquaintances, increase in education, employment in high circles, association with people of high rank, success through obstacles, birth of a child, wealth got through sons (if there is·a son), honour to religious people, virtuous acts, good traditional observances, good society and conversations, reputation, gains and court-honours.

Event.Name: SunDasaSaturnBhukti
Event.Description: Saturn's sub-period--11 months, 12 days. Constant sickness to family members, new enemies,• some loss of property, bodily ailmenu, much unhappiness, dis· placement from home accidents, quarrels with relatives, loss of money, disease, lacking in energy, ignoble calls, mental worries, loans, danger from thieve and rulers.

Event.Name: SunDasaMercuryBhukti
Event.Description: Mercury's sub-period-IO months, 6 days. Gain in money, good reputation, acquisition of new clothes and ornaments, new education, trouble through telatives, mental distress, depression of spirits, waste of money and nervous weakness, no comforts, friends becoming enemies, much anxiety and fears, health bad, children ungrateful, disputes and trouble from ruler or judge, suffer disgrace, many short journeys and wanderings.

Event.Name: SunDasaKetuBhukti
Event.Description: Ketu' s sub-period-4 months, 6 days. Loss of money, affliction of mind with troubles, faintings or nervous exhaustion, mind full of-misgivings, a long journey to a distant place, change of house due to disputes, troubles among relatives and associates, throat disease, mental anguish, ophthalmia, serious illness, fear from kings or rulers and enemies, diseases, cheated by others.

Event.Name: SunDasaVenusBhukti
Event.Description: Venus' sub-period-I year. Gain of money, respect by rulers and gain of vehicles, likelihood of marriage, increase of property, illness, does many good works, acquisition of pearls or other precious stones, fatigue, addiction to immoral females and profitless discussions.

Event.Name: MoonDasaSunBhukti
Event.Description: The Sun's sub-period - 6 months. Feverish complaints, pains in the eyes, success or failure according to position of the Sun and the Moon, legal power, free from diseases, decadence of enemies, happiness and prosperity, jaundice, dropsy, fever, loss of money, travels, danger to father and mother, piles, weakness, loss of children and friends.

Event.Name: MoonDasaMoonBhukti
Event.Description: The Moon's sub-period- 1O months. Devoted attention to learning, love or music, good clothing, company of refined society, sound health, good reputation, journey to holy places, acquisition of abandoned wealth, power, vehicles and lands; marriage, relatives, fortunate deeds, inclination to public life, change of residence, birth of a child, increase of wealth, prosperity to relatives.

Event.Name: MoonDasaMarsBhukti
Event.Description: Mars's sub-period - 7 months. Quarrels and litigation among friends and relatives, headlong enterprises, danger of disputes between husband and wife, between lovers or in regard to marital affairs; disease, petulence, loss of money, waste of wealth, trouble from brothers and friends, danger from fever and fire, injury from instruments or stones, loss of blood and disease to household animals.

Event.Name: MoonDasaRahuBhukti
Event.Description: Rahu's sub-period - 1 year, 6 months. Distress of risks from falls and dangerous diseases, waste of wealth and loss of relatives and no ease to body. loss of money, danger of stirring up enemies, sickness, anxiety, enmity of superiors and elders, anxiety and troubles through wife, scandals, change of residence, diseases of skin, danger from thieves and poison, ill-health to father and mother, suffering from hunger.

Event.Name: MoonDasaJupiterBhukti
Event.Description: Jupiter's sub-period - 1 year, 4 months. Increase of property, plenty of food and comforts, prosperous, benefits from superiors such as masters or governors, birth. of a child, vehicles, abundance of clothes and ornaments and success in undertakings, patronage or rulers, gain or property, respect, learned.

Event.Name: MoonDasaSaturnBhukti
Event.Description: Saturn's sub-period - 1 year, 7 months. Wife's death or separation, much mental anguish, loss or property, loss of friends, ill·health, mental trouble due to mother, wind and bilious affections, harsh words, and discussion with unfriendly people, disease due to indigestion, no peace of mind, quarrels with relatives.

Event.Name: MoonDasaMercuryBhukti
Event.Description: Mercury's sub-period - 1 year, 5 months. Acquisition of wealth from maternal relatives, new clothes and ornaments, settlement of disputes, pleasure through children or lover, increase of wealth, accomplishment of desires, intellectual achievements, new education, honour from rulers. general happiness, enjoyment with females, addiction to betting and drinks.

Event.Name: MoonDasaKetuBhukti
Event.Description: Ketu's sub-period - 7 months.
